ygData.subject: Re: Wizards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Don t worry, there is always a lot of low level enchanters in the game.  Most quit between L20-24 because of the lack of solo ability between those levels.
ygData.messageBody:
Alan Charity wrote:

> From: "Alan Charity" <acharity@...>
>
> With all the changes to Mages, Enchanters and Necros does anyone know of any
> changes for Wizards coming up?
>
> I mean Enchanters seem to be ruling the game now, with all the Enchanter
> only quests and new abilities they are the most powerful class in the game.
> At this rate they may have to change the name of this game to
> "EnchanterQuest". Now I know they added the Tarton's Wheel quest for us
> wizards but that isn't going to help me until I get closer to 49th and can
> actually use the runes.
>
> Aljernon of Karana
> 27th Level Wizard

Don't worry, there is always a lot of low level enchanters in the game. Most
quit between L20-24 because of the lack of solo ability between those levels.
Its not impossible to solo at those levels, but it very difficult and time
consuming
